job_history.work_description: Creates a team vision that supports the organizational vision. Skilled at turning teams into industry leading teams and developing team members into outstanding performers. Develops innovative approaches to providing high quality, cost-effective service that exceed customer expectations.
Coordinated multiple medical equipment service departments into single system department. Led effort to implement medical equipment management database that combined six separate databases.

Participated in implementation of Clinical Engineering program that maintained a high level of quality and customer satisfaction while beating budget targets by $1.6 million, and estimated cost of previous outsourced program by approximately $7.5 million during its first three years of existence.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Held multiple leadership roles, including Vice President and Corporate Director, with a proven track record of developing high-performing teams and exceeding customer expectations, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Successfully led efforts to implement a medical equipment management database and coordinated multiple departments into a single system, demonstrating strong proficiency in project management.

skills.name: Innovation
skills.explanation: Developed innovative approaches to providing high-quality, cost-effective service, suggesting a strong ability to think creatively and drive innovation.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.explanation: Skilled at turning teams into industry-leading teams and developing team members into outstanding performers, indicating expert-level mastery in team management.

skills.name: Cost Management
skills.explanation: Successfully beat budget targets by $1.6 million and estimated cost savings of $7.5 million over three years, demonstrating strong proficiency in cost management.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Consistently exceeded customer expectations, suggesting a strong ability to provide high-quality service and drive customer satisfaction.

skills.name: Database Management
skills.explanation: Implemented a medical equipment management database, demonstrating a solid working proficiency in database management.

skills.name: Clinical Engineering
skills.explanation: Participated in the implementation of a Clinical Engineering program, suggesting a solid working proficiency in clinical engineering.
